text: Are we certain as to where we're going?

And then when I got home,
When I got home, I was so inspired by them that..
I was able to write a song.
So that was the first song.
But the song that got released then,
It's already two songs about you!

A somewhat sad song was the first thing I wrote..

MARIS: And I felt like I wasn't worthy for those words because..

RICO: Okay, so they don't know it yet.

Don't you have one in those?

how I felt when I first met you..

You even got teary-eyed that time!

We were writing the song and didn't know it was about me.
RICO: That's why when you said..

RICO: Yeah, but I didn't know at the time.. MARIS: And then I told you that..
MARIS: the song was about us..

..in a way that I couldn't understand..
And then you clarified all that so..

First Thing We Noticed from Each Other  that We Found Cute.

RICO: Yeah! When I was recording you and then you went,

That's the only thing I said back then.
When I heard that, I was like..
MARIS: Mine was... RICO: I can't dip my..
my heart was beating so fast, Babe!
Because when we were going to..
This is the first time I'm hearing this!
MARIS: Babe, this was when my brother was drove me to..
MARIS: It was my dad! RICO: It was your dad!
RICO: You also said that you got lost.

I was going to meet Rico Blanco!
And you had this mysterious vibe going on
because you came in late in the studio.
So when you finally came in the studio,
I've been saying for a long time now..
It's actually awkward to say this when we're in a relationship..
I had a huge crush on you!

MARIS: And it was so out of the blue!
MARIS: And then I was thinking like,
"Hold on, I'm not even playing hard-to-get!"

MARIS: Yes, I did say "I love you" because I felt bad for you..

But I was caught off guard.
I was the first one to say it.
MARIS: You were the first one to say it.
RICO: And it was just like..
Even I was shocked at myself!
RICO: And I was shocked myself  because I haven't said that in a long time.
MARIS: In my head, I was like..

MARIS: I didn't know you that well.
RICO: Now that you know me quite well..
RICO: Would I even do that?
MARIS: Now that I know you..
It is really weird of you to say that outright then and there.
MARIS: So basically, those are our firsts!
MARIS: When it's the first month of the relationship,
couples would always reminisce on how they first met.
MARIS: Actually.. RICO: Is that right?
I mean the discussions about it doesn't actually end.
RICO: Oh, it's because people always ask,

RICO: who tagged me on Twitter..
RICO: because you were looking for someone to do a collab with!
RICO: Something like that. Am I right?
But actually, there's more to the story.
Because I tweeted that hoping that you'd see it.
Like, I intentionally tweeted that for you to really see it.
And if it was someone else who replied back,
I was lost in life - in general..
And I just came from Japan that time.
MARIS: And I was doing all sorts..

you kind of all of a sudden become this person  who has a lot of plans in life.
And I really wanted to collaborate with you

hoping that you'll listen to them..
It came to a point where..
"I can't take this anymore, I want to collaborate with him!"
RICO: Hoping that I'd see it? MARIS: Hoping that you'd see it.
My fans do know that I super idolize you so..

But meeting each other didn't happen then and there.

MARIS: Yeah, but at that time..
MARIS: And then you sent me a message..
I already said that I'm up for it!
It was at that point where..
I let you listen to all the songs I've written,
you liked one of those songs!
I thought that was the end of it!
You all of sudden invited me to watch a movie!
MARIS: And then.. RICO: No, I think..
RICO: I asked you if you've already seen..
RICO: Was it "Sound of Music"? MARIS: "Mary Poppins"
RICO: I wanted to already go on a date
because we were already done with work.
MARIS: Yeah, we were being professional.
RICO: And it wasn't immediately after.
RICO: Yeah! That's how we met!
